Uses of Package
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners

  • Packages that use org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners 
    Package Description
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.hosts
    Provides Host implementations that represent a Physical Machine (PM) is used to run Vm from different cloud customers (represented by a DatacenterBroker).
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.hosts.network
    Provides network-enabled Host implementations.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.hosts.power
    Provides power-aware Host implementations.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners
    Provides ResourceProvisioner implementations that define policies used by a Host to manage the allocation of some resource for its VMs, such as Ram, Bandwidth or Pe.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.resources
    Provides classes that represent different physical and logical Resource used by simulation objects such as Hosts and VMs.
    org.cloudsimplus.builders
    Provides Builder classes that implement the Builder Design Pattern to allow instantiating multiple simulation objects more easily.
  • Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners used by org.cloudbus.cloudsim.hosts 
    Class and Description
    ResourceProvisioner
    An interface that represents the provisioning policy used by a host to allocate a given resource to virtual machines inside it.
  • Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners used by org.cloudbus.cloudsim.hosts.network 
    Class and Description
    ResourceProvisioner
    An interface that represents the provisioning policy used by a host to allocate a given resource to virtual machines inside it.
  • Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners used by org.cloudbus.cloudsim.hosts.power 
    Class and Description
    ResourceProvisioner
    An interface that represents the provisioning policy used by a host to allocate a given resource to virtual machines inside it.
  • Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners used by org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners 
    Class and Description
    AbstractResourceProvisioner
    An abstract class that implements the basic features of a provisioning policy used by a host to allocate a given resource to virtual machines inside it.
    PeProvisioner
    /** PeProvisioner is an abstract class that represents the provisioning policy used by a host to allocate its PEs to virtual machines inside it.
    ResourceProvisioner
    An interface that represents the provisioning policy used by a host to allocate a given resource to virtual machines inside it.
